p: Study patients were recruited from the clinical practice of the lung transplant program at Mayo Clinic in Jacksonville, Florida. Inclusion and exclusion criteria are listed in Table 1. This study was approved by the Mayo Clinic Institutional Review Board (ID 14‚Äê000025), conducted under IND 15807 from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA), and registered at Clinicaltrails.gov, NCT02181712.
